rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with Vastu compliant positioning ensuring proper energy flow. This area is designed to be wheelchair accessible and includes smooth transitions from the two-car garage.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A large living area overlooking the central courtyard. The room follows traditional Kerala aesthetics with wooden beams and tiled flooring.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, with ample space for family gatherings. Designed with Vastu principles ensuring proper orientation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern yet traditional Kerala kitchen space featuring local materials. The layout is optimized for accessibility and ease of movement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the courtyard. The room is designed for comfort and privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom integrated with traditional Kerala style elements. The room is wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A well-appointed bedroom designed with local materials and Vastu principles in mind.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A compact living area for the servants, ensuring functionality and respect to local customs. It includes a small kitchenette.

openings.name: Garage Entrance
openings.description: A double-car garage with ample space for two vehicles. Positioned on the West side as per request, ensuring proper Vastu orientation.

openings.name: Main Front Door
openings.description: The primary entrance to the Nalukettu, designed for accessibility and aesthetic appeal. It leads directly into a spacious foyer.

openings.name: Courtyard Access Doors
openings.description: Multiple openings leading from the interior rooms to the central courtyard, fostering natural ventilation and light.

vastu_advice: Design elements incorporate Vastu principles such as proper room positioning and open spaces to ensure a balanced flow of energy. The central courtyard is strategically placed for natural ventilation and light.
accessibility_features: All main areas are wheelchair accessible with ramps, widened doorways, and non-slip surfaces to comply with local accessibility standards.
